description: Welcome to ' Fraser'' by Mosaic, located in the heart of University at SFU. This modern 3 Bed + Den Townhome offers 1,629 sf of stylish living with 10’ ceilings on the main and 9’ ceilings on the top floor. Open-concept main level features a Shaker Kitchen w/ KitchenAid S/S appliance package, quartz countertops, oversized windows, radiant in-floor heating, and a Fenced Patio. A huge DEN at the lower floor which can be turned into an office or 4th bedroom. The upper floor features 2 bedrooms as well as a laundry room with storage. The top floor features the master bedroom with a 4 piece ensuite. 1 parking included. Steps away to a leading childcare facility, a highly ranked elementary school, Nesters Market, the Lorne Davies Recreation Complex, and popular hiking trails in Burnaby Mountain.
